page.title: 04VIEWS OF A MAN IN CURY
page.content: I would like to see a few more local job opportunities so it becomes more of a community again. If you talk to people who have lived in the village all their lives,and are now retired, this little village up to some six years ago, used to be a totally self sufficient community. It used to have its own school, and a shop where you could buy all your shopping. It also used to have its own smithy,carpenter, a cobbler and there were a lot more people living and working in the village. Fishing was a secondary industry where people could get another income. All the amenities, if you like the country life and unspoilt beaches, are really natural ones. Gunwalloe is a nice area to live in.
